reasoning: Reporting incidence (new events). Brain ischemia/ischemic stroke global incidence ~150 per 100k person-years based on WHO stroke surveillance. Varies by region and age.
source: Feigin VL et al. (2003). Stroke epidemiology: a review of population-based studies of incidence, prevalence, and case-fatality in the late 20th century. Lancet Neurol. 2(1):43-53
